pages.text: So your lands have especially intriguing terrain, congrats!$(br)Sadly, with the way Terralith modifies terrain and replaces biomes, it makes some of Spectrum's worldgen near-impossible to generate. The terrain does not have the required layout anymore.

Rest assured, you will not be locked out of anything. If your book calls for you to look out for $(thing)Swamps$(), just look for $(thing)Mangrove Swamps$() only. There is also another way to get that resource, once you require it.
